name: Custom chat colors
additional_info: To install this Style, download the Stylus extension for either: Chrome Firefox To change the colors, open up the Stylus extension from here and go to manage. Open up the 'Custom chat colors' style by clicking on it here The code window should look like this,from here it's self explanatory, set the colors to anything you like by clicking on the color boxes, the comments enclosed in /* */ tell you what you're editing, Make sure live preview in the top left corner is checked so you can preview the changes in real-time.
